questions: Where is the Finance and Accounting Department?

Location of Finance and Accounting Department
Where to find the Finance and Accounting Department?
answers: The Finance and Accounting Department is located at the ground floor of Don Rodolfo T. Lizares, Sr Building also known as the main building. It is near ETO and Accounting Department. Here's an image of the Finance and Accounting Department:
